ape noun [C]
(ANIMAL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a mammal that has long arms and no tail or a short tail and that is related to monkeys: Chimpanzees, gorillas, and orangutans are all apes.
ape verb [T]
(COPY)
to copy something or someone: Because of snob appeal, high-priced American clothing stores ape British usage and call suspenders "braces."
